磎字的基本解释

磎
xī
古同“谿”，山谷：“临千仞之石磎。”

磎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qī］
［《廣韻》苦奚切，平齊，溪。］
(1)山间小水沟。
(2)小路。

磎字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　磎； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页834第31
【廣韻】苦奚切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】牽奚切，?音鸂。同谿。【爾雅·釋水】水注川曰谿。【說文】山通者。【馬融·長笛賦】瀆無所臨，萬仞之石磎。　又地名。【水經】濟水又東至北礫磎。

磎字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
磎字的起名意思

古同“谿”，山谷。

磎
Basic explanation of words
磎
xī
Ancient Tong "Stream", Valley: "Lin Qianren's Stone Ding."
磎
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qī］
["Guangyun" bitterly cut, level, stream. ]
(1) Small ditches in the mountains.
(2) Small road.
磎
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [Stone Character Department] 　磎; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 834 31
[Guang Yun] bitterly cuts [Jiyun] [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun] cuts the bitterly,? Yin Yang. Tongxi. 【Erya·Release Water】Water is poured into the river and called the stream. [Speaking] Shantong people. [Ma Rong·Flute Fu] Nowhere is blasphemy, the stone of ten thousand ren.　Also place name. [Water economy] Jishui reaches north to Lili from the east.
